      • inverse

        public static Matrix inverse(Matrix matrix)
                      throws NoSquareException
        Inverse of a matrix - A-1 * A = I where I is the identity matrix A matrix that have inverse is called non-singular or invertible. If the matrix does not have inverse it is called singular. For a singular matrix the values of the inverted matrix are either NAN or Infinity Only square matrices have inverse and the following method will throw exception if the matrix is not square.
        Parameters:
        matrix -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        NoSquareException
